message.body: Hey. Is Xuan still delivering tomorrow?
Hahah if only! They scheduled her c-section for Tuesday but I'm taking her to her last check up tomorrow and how convenient would it be if her water broke if we're already there?!
*when we're already
Plus, her due date is tomorrow.
Oh I see. She's due tomorrow technically but it might not actually happen.
I got all the messages late and figured I'd just ask you.
Yup, it's all up to those babies.
Well hopefully it's soon. I'm sure she's tired of carrying them around.
Yea, she's so over it. She exhausted. We all feel bad.
Is she a mean pregnant lady?
No, she is more or less the same. She usually is already impatient but even more so while pregnant.
She's actually going full term. People are surprised hearing that since twins usually come sooner. It looks like she's wearing a beach ball underneath her dress.
She's big.
Haha yeah I remember when I heard she was having twins, I really wanted to see her full
Well we'll be at Penn tomorrow.
Haha right i'll just stop in to make fun of her size
She kind of shows people herself hahah. She walks like a penguin. It's cute.
What time are you there? Is it weird if I do stop by?
Around 11:45. No, not at all.
Okay cool. I'll stop by.
What street is this?
It's the main hospital. So it's on 34th.
Where we went together last til
Time*?
Lady summer?
**last
When she was in the hospital
I think that was the emergency room/area. If you walk down Spruce towards the lower numbers and turn right on 34th, the hospital entrance is there.
Okay yeah just making sure that was the general area
That is my geographical knowledge of it thus far hahahah.
Okay that's fine haha we'll work It out tomorrow
Cool cool cool.
Hey Xuan said the appointment today is going to be at the Perelman Center which is across the street from the main hospital.
Okay thanks.
You get there at 11:45. Do you know how long you'll be there?
We are probably going to get there a little later. Good point. We'll probably be there for an hour or two.
I took her for another appointment this past Tuesday and we were there for four hours but I don't think it'll be as long this time.
Okay let me know when you get there and I'll be around
Okay.
We'll be at the entrance in 5.
Okay
We're here.
I'm on my way
,I'm outside
Come in, go to the elevators toward the right, And go to the second floor, and turn right.
Go straight towards the Abramson center.
Look at the signs on the ceiling and follow it to where it says "pre-admission" testing.
We're in that office.
Hey, we had to go in. Sorry, let me know when you're back.
Jason said he'll take the blame if Xuan doesn't like the drink.
Hahahah Xuan said thank you!
Did she try it?
Yea, she said tell Michael thanks because she likes it and feels "more alive".
Haha okay good. I was hoping for that
Yea seriously, thanks. Her mood changed and she feels better now.
Good
Yea, she was chatting it up in the waiting room and had all these people laughing.
Did you leave the place I have her the drink?
*gave
Yes, we went back upstairs.
Okay cause I was like, why is she in the waiting room again? Gotcha
She really likes it and asks what did you get?
I think it was an iced tea with the pomegranate sauce that goes into the Italian soda. But I said "no carbonation!"
It was a special order
Damn, you got on that drink.
Yes I did.
You remember what I said earlier?
About what?
Think back!
